content: भोजन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [भुज्-ल्यु ल्युट् वा] Feeding, nourishing, giving to eat. --नः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu. {@--2@} Of Śiva. --नं {@--1@} Eating, eating food; taking one's meals; अर्जीर्णे भोजनं विषं. {@--2@} Food {@--3@} Giving (food) to eat, feeding. {@--4@} Using, enjoying. {@--5@} Any object of enjoyment. {@--6@} That which is enjoyed. {@--7@} Property, wealth, possessions.
